Arizona Winter School 2014: Arithmetic Statistics

AWS 2014 will be held March 15-19, 2014 at the University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.

  • Click here to register and/or apply for funding. Registration is open to all.
    The deadline to apply for funding is January 10, 2014.
  • Speakers:
    • Chantal David: Curves and zeta functions over finite fields
    • Jordan Ellenberg: Geometric analytic number theory
    • Bjorn Poonen: Selmer group heuristics and sieves
    • Melanie Matchett Wood: Asymptotics for number fields and class groups
  • Organizers: Bryden Cais and Matthew Papanikolas (main program), with Mirela Ciperiani, Rachel Pries, and Romyar Sharifi.
